title: Fennel and herb barbecued whole fish
description: Big flavours are packed into this tidy parcel for the barbecue - citrus, fennel and salty capers really make it sing.
ingredients: 4 whole fish (such as sea bass, sea bream, trout or red mullet), approx. 350-450g/12oz-1lb each, gutted and scaled
1 medium bulb of fennel, roughly chopped
2 large handfuls of mixed fresh herbs - parsley, dill, tarragon, basil
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
salad and crusty bread, to serve
You will need 12-16 lengths of string about 15cm/6in long, soaked in water for 1 hour.
